song.title: Here as in Heaven
song.lyrics:
[V] .G D The atmosphere is changing now .G D For the Spirit of the Lord is here .G D The evidence is all around .G/B D That the Spirit of the Lord is here
[C] .G Overflow in this place . Bm Fill our hearts with Your love . A Your love, surrounds us || .G Bm Youâ€™re the reason we came, to encounter Your love . A Your love, surrounds us --- [B] .G A Bm Spirit of God fall fresh on us . A We need Your presence .G A Bm Your kingdom come, Your will be done . A Here as in Heaven
[INSTRUMENTAL] .G - Em - Bm - A .G - Em - Bm - A
[Ending] .G D/A A miracle can happen now .G/B D/A For the Spirit of the Lord is here .G D/A The evidence is all around .G/B D/A (G) That the Spirit of the Lord is here
song.presentation: V C V C B ENDING
